short_description: mcloughlin's craft butchers is a butcher shop based in clondalkin, ireland.
long_description: it allows the website owner to implement or change the website's content in real-time. we are a third generation family business and have been butchering in dublin since 1965. we supply many hospitality businesses around ireland. from mitchelin star restaurants to food trucks and everything in between. very often it is a struggle to source top quality meat, and price often tempts you to compromise and settle for second best – but in business your reputation is everything. we supply a wide range of partners in the hospitality sector throughout ireland. are you in the hospitality business and looking for premium meat from a premium supplier. pat is a business owner and master butcher… he can be found in the factory hand selecting carcasses, cutting steaks and solving chefs problems. at mcloughlins we strive to maintain and grow our business each day … this would not be possible without the help of our team.

generated_description: mcloughlin butchers is a family-owned business based in dublin, leinster, specializing in the butchering and supply of high-quality meats. established in 1965, the company operates as a third-generation family business, with pat mcloughlin as the owner and master butcher, and kate mcloughlin overseeing various aspects of the business including orders, product development, marketing, and customer service. mcloughlin butchers supplies premium meats to a wide range of hospitality businesses across ireland, from michelin-starred restaurants to food trucks. the company has a long-standing reputation for providing professional and reliable service, ensuring top-quality meat for all its customers.
